original_text: You must not think that you are too important to help other people. If you are not really so important, you are thinking a false thought.
korean_text: 만일 누가 아무 것도 되지 못하고 된 줄로 생각하면 스스로 속임이라

sentences.original_text: If you are not really so important
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 정말로 그렇게 중요하지 않다면

sentences.original_text: you are thinking a false thought
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 거짓된 생각을 하고 있는 것입니다
